title: SafeStride — Smart Obstacle Detection Add-On
desc: A detachable ultrasonic-based smart cane attachment that enhances obstacle detection for visually impaired users.
tech: Ultrasonic Sensor, Microcontroller, Embedded C, Prototyping, User Testing

title: HabiTrack — Youth Habit & Fitness Tracking App
desc: A gamified habit-tracking concept designed to help youths build consistent fitness routines.

title: UniCycle — Campus Marketplace & Peer Support App
